pullRequest.title: Map more 1.16 additions to default biome features
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request maps the following 1.16 additions to DefaultBiomeFeatures:

Miscellaneous Nether feature configs such as basalt/blackstone blobs, deltas, basalt columns, and springs
Configured ruined portal features

commit.message: Map the remaining Nether feature configs
Map the configured ruined portal features

nodes.bodyText: Why did you name these with CONFIGURED?
